snippet: Deaths of bicyclists and occupants of large trucks rose sharply last year, even as total traffic fatalities dropped to their lowest level since 1949, federal safety officials said on Monday.
abstract: National Highway Traffic Safety Administration says deaths of bicyclists and occupants of large trucks rose sharply in 2012, even as total traffic fatalities dropped to their lowest level since 1949.
lead_paragraph: Deaths of bicyclists and occupants of large trucks rose sharply last year, even as total traffic fatalities dropped to their lowest level since 1949, federal safety officials said on Monday.

headline.seo: Traffic Deaths Decline, Except in Two Categories
headline.main: Traffic Deaths Decline, Except in Two Categories
headline.print_headline: Traffic Deaths Decline, Except In Two Categories
